title: Lowest proportion of population pushed into poverty by healthcare costs
description: In 2015, only 0.01% of Bosnia and Herzegovina's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenditures, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Lowest informal payments to public officials
description: In 2023, only 0.1% of firms in Bosnia and Herzegovina reported making informal payments to public officials, indicating a low level of corruption.

title: Smallest population in largest city
description: As of 2024, the largest city in Bosnia and Herzegovina has a population of 346,859, which is relatively small compared to other countries' largest cities.

title: Lowest air freight transport
description: In 2015, Bosnia and Herzegovina had an air freight transport volume of only 0.000087 million ton-km, one of the lowest in the world.
